name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabme — Organize Tabs and Bookmarks. Version without newtab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity — Turn chaotic browsing into a structured experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
All your documents are one click away, on one screen.

Tabme is entirely free to use.

------------------------------------------------------------
Alternatively, get the full Tabme experience with Tabme on every new tab:  https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/toby-manage-your-tabs/hddnkoipeenegfoeaoibdmnaalmgkpip 
------------------------------------------------------------

Key Features:

👆 Simple Interface With Intuitive Drag-and-Drop
Save your tabs effortlessly by dragging and dropping them into a Folder.
Сolor coding and arranging in space helps find saved tabs instantly.

📦 Stash Open Tabs
Save all your open tabs into a folder by clicking "Stash all Tabs".
Use "Open All" in the Folder menu to restore all saved Tabs.

🧹 Close Duplicated tabs
Close the duplicate tabs with a single click. Press the button in the sidebar.

🚀 Performance-Driven
Works fast even with hundreds of saved tabs.

🔎 Smart Search Functionality
Seamlessly search across open, saved, archived, and recently closed tabs.

🌙 Dark Mode Support
Switch to dark mode for comfortable viewing at night or in low-light environments.

⌨️ Keyboard Accessibility Support
Manage bookmarks and tabs using keyboard shortcuts for faster navigation.

------------------------------------------------------------

Guide: https://gettabme.com/guide.html
What's new: https://gettabme.com/whats-new.html
